metadata.title: CVE-2014-8136 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The (1) qemuDomainMigratePerform and (2) qemuDomainMigrateFinish2 functionsin qemu/qemu_driver.c in libvirt do not unlock the domain when an ACL checkfails, which allow local users to cause a denial of service via unspecifiedvectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8136` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.16').
